verses.roman:
prabhu catur-bhuja-mūrti tāṅre dekhāila
ātmasāt kari' tāre āliṅgana kaila

synonyms: prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; catur-bhuja-mūrti—four-armed form; tāṅre—unto him; dekhāila—showed; ātmasāt kari'—accepting; tāre—him; āliṅgana kaila—embraced.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu then showed Kāśī Miśra His four-armed form. Then, accepting him for His service, the Lord embraced him.
